```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r libs}
library(blorr)
library(magrittr)
```

### Regression Model

```{r model}
model <- glm(honcomp ~ female + read + science, data = hsb2,
             family = binomial(link = 'logit'))
```

### Confusion Matrix

```{r val5}
blr_confusion_matrix(model, cutoff = 0.5)
```

### Hosmer Lemeshow Test

```{r val6}
blr_hosmer_lemeshow_test(model)
```


### Gains Table

```{r val1}
blr_gains_table(model)
```

### Lift Chart

```{r val7}
model %>%
	blr_gains_table %>%
	plot
```

### ROC Curve

```{r val2, fig.align='center', fig.width=7, fig.height=5}
model %>%
	blr_gains_table %>%
  blr_roc_curve
```

### KS Chart

```{r val3, fig.align='center', fig.width=7, fig.height=5}
model %>%
	blr_gains_table %>%
  blr_ks_chart
```

### Capture Rate by Decile

```{r val8, fig.align='center', fig.width=7, fig.height=5}
model %>%
  blr_gains_table %>%
  blr_decile_capture_rate
```


### Lorenz Curve

```{r val4, fig.align='center', fig.width=7, fig.height=5}
blr_lorenz_curve(model)
```
